snippet.title: Marko: Beyond Brave Teaser
snippet.description:
Marko: Beyond Brave is an atmospheric 2D Metroidvania, inspired by classic cartoons and Slavic folklore. Beautifully hand-drawn and animated. Developed using UE4 and lots of passion for the action-adventure genre. Support us on Kickstarter: https://bit.ly/3ftgpve

Find out more at https://markobeyondbrave.com 
https://facebook.com/MarkoBeyondBrave
https://twitter.com/BraveMarko
